So I downloaded the first 2 seasons and they work fine, but for some reason, most if not all the epsidoes from this one are buggy for me. Epsiode 55 for example appears to be playing very fast and is only about 15 seconds long. Some of the others have the audio lagging REALLY far behind or there are skips in the video every couple of seconds. I'm using AVC to convert them to .AVI from .MKV and watch them on my pc with WMP. I have all the proper codecs and what not as everything else I play works fine, including (as I said before) the previous 2 seasons. If you could get back to me on this that'd be great. I spent a long time downloading the torrents and was pretty bummed. I registered just to see if there was something going on, as the only other season 3 torrent here is not dubbed. =| Thanks in advance.

@ raven6613

Its either your player or the conversion went wrong some where , 

Plus I do check my uploads before sharing them. and all works fine .

My recommendation is use KMPLAYER its free and plays almost every thing .

if that didnt work for you re-download only Eps 55

If worse comes to worse and I can't figure it out I can pull a few episodes from Youtube with Zamzar. Quality of sound and video is great so I hate to miss out though XD Thanks again, and Happy Holidays. =]

Mystery solved! For those who think 70-71 are not there. They are there, they're just sort of out of order. For reasons unknown, episodes 58-69 have a u with a line over it in "Shippuden", so 70-71 end up between 57 and 58.

Hi Pixels1080. So as I've seen in a lot of the comments some episodes don't work. I have a pretty decent video converter, but it says the episodes do not exist in particular episodes 58-69. I never knew what that meant, but nonetheless i can't convert them. I know it would be a big hassle for you to do, but on behalf of everyone i think you should consider converting this season in avi. It doesn't make sense, i can convert seasons 4 and 5, but not this one. I would really appreciate it. I can't find season 3 anywhere else, and even on this site, it's subbed.  Hope to hear from you soon.
